hero.title: White-Label Card Issuing
hero.subtitle: Launch your own payment card program, fully customized to your brand, without the traditional complexities.

steps.title: From Idea to Reality in 3 Simple Steps

design.title: Design & Customization
design.description: Define the card type (credit, debit, prepaid), configure financial parameters, and customize the design to match your brand identity.

launch.title: Launch & Distribution
launch.description: Instantly issue virtual cards via our API or order physical cards. We handle production and logistics for you.

management.title: Management & Control
management.description: Use our dashboard to manage accounts, track transactions, set limits, and access detailed real-time analytics.

features.title: A Complete and Flexible Platform
features.subtitle: All the tools you need for a successful card program.

hybrid.title: Hybrid Cards
hybrid.description: Combine credit, debit, and prepaid features on a single card to create innovative and flexible financial products.

virtual.title: Instant Virtual Cards
virtual.description: Generate and distribute virtual cards in seconds, ready for online and mobile payments.

api.title: Comprehensive API
api.description: Automate every aspect of your card program, from account creation to transaction management, with our RESTful API.

credit.title: Credit Cards
credit.description: Offer lines of credit with fully customizable interest rates, limits, and billing cycles.

debit.title: Debit Cards
debit.description: Connect cards directly to your users' accounts for real-time transactions, with advanced spending controls.

prepaid.title: Prepaid Cards
prepaid.description: Ideal for gift cards, corporate expenses, or rewards programs. Reloadable and easy to manage.
